replies.message: I have a situation that I need help with. I was messaged by one of my supposed friends and the person lied and told me she received $100,000. All she had to do was pay a certain amount for shipping fees. At first I thought it was legitimate, because it was a dear friend. Upon clolser research I realized it was not her at all.  I have the name, account number to the bank and a Facebook page he has. I have been ask to re-friend another friend by the same guy. Can you help stop this?
Hi Akramul. Thanks for bringing this to our attention. The best way to report content on Facebook is by using the Report link near it. To learn more, please visit: http://bit.ly/2pUwfEZ. -Jessica
